amendment.description: An amendment numbered 49 printed in Part B of House Report 118-216 to reduce the salary of Claire Trickler-McNulty, Assistant Director, ICE Office of Program Evaluation, to $1.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Boebert amendment (A023) Failed by recorded vote: 161 - 267 (Roll no. 452).

action.text: Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Boebert amendment (A023) Failed by recorded vote: 161 - 267 (Roll no. 452).
